title: Best of The Herd: 09/12/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 09/12/2019
description:
Sam Darnold is sick and Colin says the Jets season is over and the Patriots have already clinched the division before week 2 has even started.  He says the Rams will crush the Saints this weekend because they were the better team last year even without help from the refs and are the better team now.  Plus, Greg Cosell of NFL Films talks about Dak Prescott and Lamar Jackson being tough to evaluate after week 1 because they played against horrible defenses 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
